# Class AudioData

Audio data for graph processing.

Contains audio waveform data and sample rate information.

##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Methods

destroy getData

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new AudioData(audioData?: [AudioChunkInterface](/interfaces/common_data_types_common.AudioChunkInterface)): [AudioData]()

Creates a new AudioData instance.

#### Parameters

    * `Optional`audioData: [AudioChunkInterface](/interfaces/common_data_types_common.AudioChunkInterface)

Optional audio data configuration

#### Returns [AudioData]()

Overrides BaseData.constructor

Retrieves the audio data as an AudioChunkInterface.

Object containing audio data and sample rate
